articles.author: Kit Maher, Jennifer Hansler
articles.title: White House announces wrongfully detained American teacher Marc Fogel released from Russia in an ‘exchange’ - CNN
articles.description: The Trump administration secured the release of Marc Fogel, an American teacher detained for more than three years in Russia, in an “exchange,” the White House announced Tuesday.
articles.content:
The Trump administration secured the release of Marc Fogel, an American teacher detained for more than three years in Russia, in an exchange, the White House announced Tuesday.
